name: Apple Tree Bay Campsite
introducti: Walk-in or boat-in to this beachside campsite on the Tinline to Anchorage section of the Abel Tasman Coast Track. There is no drive on access.
facilities: Non-powered/tent sites, Water from tap - not treated, boil before use, Toilets - non-flush, Toilets, Water supply
hasAlerts: Refer to DOC website for current alerts
locationSt: Located in Abel Tasman National Park

name: Observation Beach Campsite
introducti: Visit this beachside campsite on the Tinline to Anchorage section of the Abel Tasman Coast Track.
facilities: Non-powered/tent sites, Water from tap - not treated, boil before use, Toilets - non-flush, Toilets, Water supply
hasAlerts: Refer to DOC website for current alerts
locationSt: Located in Abel Tasman National Park

name: Mutton Cove Campsite
introducti: Walk-in or boat-in to this beachside campsite on the Waiharakeke to Whariwharangi section of the Abel Tasman Coast Track. There is no drive on access.
facilities: Fire pit/place for campfires (except in fire bans), Non-powered/tent sites, Toilets - flush, Water from tap - not treated, boil before use, Toilets, Water supply
hasAlerts: Refer to DOC website for current alerts
locationSt: Located in Abel Tasman National Park
